recommended_degree: Hospitality dan Pariwisata, Manajemen Perhotelan, Hubungan Internasional, Ilmu Komunikasi, Bahasa dan Sastra Inggris (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_title: Concierge (Front Office)-Holiday Inn Lampung Bukit Randu
job_description:
REQUIREMENTS
Male.
Holder of SIM A (active driving license).
Physically fit and able to perform operational duties.
Strong communication skills in both Indonesian and English.
Professional attitude, friendly personality, and strong problem solving abilities.
Willing to work in shifts.
Neat, polite, and well groomed appearance aligned with hotel standards.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
Welcome guests warmly and provide personalized assistance throughout their stay.
Handle guest inquiries, requests, and complaints promptly to ensure guest satisfaction.
Coordinate luggage assistance, storage, and delivery in collaboration with the Bell Desk team.
Maintain updated knowledge of local events, tourist destinations, and hotel promotions.
Ensure the concierge area stays clean, organized, and presentable at all times.
Communicate guest needs and special requests to relevant departments (Front Office, Housekeeping, Security, etc.).
Follow hotel SOPs, safety procedures, and IHG service standards consistently.
Carry out additional tasks assigned by the Front Office Manager or Supervisor as needed.
